snippet.title: Tactical Breach Wizards gameplay trailer - Act 2
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043810/Tactical_Breach_Wizards/
The game's shaping up nicely, and we're showing it off a little differently this time: this trailer is by the great Derek Lieu: https://www.derek-lieu.com/
The music is by our composer Robert Arzola, who's also doing the music for the game: https://robertarzola.com/
We'll still be doing long and rambly talkthroughs too, it's just we've done a bunch of those for Wizards, and it would get spoilery to fully explain some of what's new here.
Team:
Words/Design/Some Code: Tom Francis
Art Director: John Roberts
Programming: John Winder
Music: Robert Arzola
Level Design: Steve Lee
